## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Typecheck passes (`npx tsc --noEmit`)
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] E2E tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No debug code (console.log, debugger, etc.)

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if installation/usage changed)
- [ ] API docs updated (if backend contract changed)
- [ ] Decision log updated (if architectural decision)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if user-facing change)

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests added for new logic (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration test verified (end-to-end flow works)
- [ ] Playwright test added (if critical user flow)
- [ ] Manual smoke test completed

### Review
- [ ] Self-reviewed (read my own diff)
- [ ] Tagged appropriate reviewer (George for backend, Edwin for UI)
- [ ] All feedback addressed
